## Load packages
```{r}
#install.packages("pwr")
library(pwr)
```

## Define parameters
```{r}
# Factors
## Moisture levels = low, medium, high = 3
## Time points = 0, 24, 48 hours = 3
## Strength test = vertical, horizontal = 2

num_groups <- 3*3*2 #number of groups in ANOVA
effect_size <- 0.40 #Cohen's f (medium effect size for ANOVA)
alpha <- 0.05 #significance level
power <- 0.8 #desired power (standard; higher would be 90%)
```

## Sample size calculation
```{r}
result <- pwr.anova.test(f = effect_size, sig.level = alpha, power = power, k = num_groups)
result

## ~8 samples per group with large effect, ~20 for medium effect
```
